pages.text: An imperfect ritual that enhances all enchantments on an item by one level. This powerful ritual permanently marks the item, preventing it from being enhanced again.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place an Amethyst Block on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 5000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect; it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)1. Hold the item in your mainhand$(br)2. Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone$(br)3. All enchantments gain +1 level$(br)4. Item is marked as enhanced$(br)5. The stone remains for future use$(br2)$(bold)Limitations:$()$(li)Items can only be enhanced once$(li)Cannot remove enhancement mark$(li)Enhanced items cannot be processed by the Ritual of Unmaking (configurable)$(br2)$(italic)Push enchantments beyond their limits.$()
